citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:50 pm on April
12, 2024. There was no one at the facility. The registrant was contacted by phone and they were away and not sure when
they could return and there was no one else who could come and accompany the inspection. Failure to provide access to
the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may
result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:50 pm on April 
12, 2024. There was no one at the facility. The registrant was contacted by phone and they were away and not sure when 
they could return and there was no one else who could come and accompany the inspection. Failure to provide access to 
the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may 
result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
